statements: DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND interests LIKE '%technology%';
DELETE FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE customer_id = 100 AND recommendation_type = 'New Arrivals';
DELETE FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' AND age = 30;
DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 100 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM website_content WHERE category = 'news' AND content_type = 'article';
DELETE FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE customer_id = 100 AND recommendation_score > 0.5;
